extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN335; FREN435; FREN403

basic.description: A detailed study of representative Québécois authors since 1965. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 335/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman québécois de 1965 à nos jours
